content:
A couple of recent site/Transformative changes: 

1. I'm now using [Acquiescence](https://github.com/barryf/acquiescence), my new IndieAuth server for auth/tokens, on this domain.
2. You can subscribe to a new [JSON feed](https://barryfrost.com/feed.json) for homepage content. The RSS feed hasn't gone away but I thought I'd also support the new [JSON Feed format](https://jsonfeed.org).
